Description: 
-------------- 
MoviePlus X5 is a powerful solution for digital video editing tools easy to use and enjoy stunning studio-quality effects. Produce professional films and write the result to a DVD or Blu-ray, or upload to the web to share with friends, family or the world. 

About: 

Publisher and developer of powerful, and easy to use software. 

Serif develops and publishes award-winning software range that includes PagePlus ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢, PhotoPlus, DrawPlus ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢, ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢ WebPlus, MoviePlus ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢, ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢ ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢ PanoramaPlus and Digital Scrapbook Artist. 
Founded in 1987 with the goal of developing better alternatives for value packs high-level design and publishing, Serif has been repeatedly praised for its powerful and easy to use software that allows businesses, educational institutions, and users normal PC for professional quality results - whatever your experience level. 
With more than 6 million customers worldwide and over 200 independent awards and accolades from respected industry publications, Serif has over 200 employees at its head office, development and European sales center in Nottingham , United Kingdom and North American sales operation in New Hampshire, USA. 

The new X5 features MoviPlus Serif 

- Burn Blu-ray 
Create your own Blu-ray discs directly from MoviePlus, to preserve your memories in high definition. 
- Export AVCHD ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢ 
Record AVCHD video from regular DVD MoviePlus X5 - no need to buy expensive disks to create high-definition movies. 
- Best HD video 
Working with HD video is now faster than ever with improved MoviePlus intelligent engine and the ability to prioritize tasks in the background. 
- Top-level disc menus 
Add animated menus, chapter points and more - just like commercial DVDs. The flexible design that helps to get professional results. 
- Reduce video noise 
Improve the appearance of video captured in low light grain and handheld devices by eliminating all noise. 
- Image stabilization 
Make your movies easier to see. Reduce unwanted camera movements by adding image stabilization to any part of the film. 
- Real-time flying 
Instantly keep overlays (used in transitions and other effects), when the clips are removed and inserted, so the issue is even easier. 
- Multi-trim Dialogue 
Make all the trimmings and cuts at a time! Great for quick removal of scenes, out-takes and errors and reduces editing time. 
- Improved user interface 
Find the tools and features you need quickly in the new image, and intuitive interface MoviePlus X5. 
- Custom Shortcuts 
Work faster! Set your own keyboard shortcuts for commonly used actions to accelerate workflow. 
- Media Panel classification 
Make finding the right video clips, audio and other media quickly and easily by filtering searches. 
- Color Pass effect 
Easy to choose a single color in a film otherwise black and white or a scene to great effect.
